website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for being one of the lightest models on the market. If you need an infant seat that is easy to carry, this one is worth considering.
pros: Only 8 lbs., but it offers side impact protection and a 5-point harness
Easy to put on/take off its base
cons: The lightweight build is both a plus and a concern
Some owners report that it has a flimsy feel compared to other models

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: I am so angry with myself why I even bother to buy this carseat. My son just made it to a month old and the handle broke off. I'd say we only used it for a maximum of 5 times which includes doctor appointments and quick errands. It's pretty much from the house, to the car, to the stroller. Material must be of poor quality for the handle to break off within the timeframe we used it. It's the price you pay for trying to save money. Better to spend more for better quality carseat. Will try to contact the company and see if I can get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very poor
customer_reviews.text: The car seat got stuck on the base the second time we used it and we were never able to unlatch it again. Very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: caro

customer_reviews.title: Bad Canopy, leaves baby exposed to sun
customer_reviews.text: The canopy does not stay up and the child will be exposed to the harsh sun. The other issue I have is that the pads over the harness are not washable. The child will not be protected from the sun. I did contact maxi-cosi regarding this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Michal

customer_reviews.title: this infant seat has practically no padding
customer_reviews.text: His baby seat has little to no padding. The baby didn't seem to mind. However, there is little to no fiber filler or padding between the infant and the plastic seat. I would not purchase this again if I had known that.
customer_reviews.author: dribback

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic car seat. Very light weight for carrying around my infant. Very easy to install and take in/out of base. I did wish the canopy provided better extended shade
customer_reviews.author: Sula

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! It’s very light, attaches to base easily , fabric easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura zepeda

customer_reviews.title: I am a mother of 3 and 4th baby on ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a mother of 3 and 4th baby on the way and with all 3 of my babies I used maxi cosi car seat and just order another one for my 4th baby. It's very light weight and you definitly can't go wrong with all black!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is ok. Tha car seat arrived at time! Is not heavy! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love it, it was shipped fast. Perfect for our little girl
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay but boo for canopy
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because if it wasn't for the canopy that's almost useless I would have been very happy with it. I plan on returning it because well it's summer time and I need the canopy to protect my child from sunlight. Otherwise, i like how light it is and it's cheaper than other brands and/or models.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: fits my new born perfectly. wish the base would ...
customer_reviews.text: fits my new born perfectly. wish the base would be more stable with some sort of strap to hold the front down. alas, it's just held by simple belt leaving the front untether. It appears that is how all of these systems work.
customer_reviews.author: 4runner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat, baby looks comfortable n it's very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: MD I.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My husband aND I loves the look of it, was a bit surprised at how big it was, my 2yr old fit comfortably in it and she's big for her age. Haven't tried it out yet since baby isn't here yet but overall product looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kaydia

customer_reviews.title: The best thing about it is that it fits on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most lightweight infant car seat and therefore a bit flimsy compared to others. Fitting it onto its base and taking it off could not be easier. The best thing about it is that it fits on a Bugaboo stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Dad

customer_reviews.title: Just click and it's good to go
customer_reviews.text: 100% compatible with the 2013 Quinny Buzz Extra stroller. Just click and it's good to go. No need to buy separate pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Halder Labarrere

customer_reviews.title: CHINA MADE BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Very dissatisfied, we bought this only because it was stayed that it's made in the USA. When we received it it had made in China on the box and product! We are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Kacy

customer_reviews.title: The seat works great though, but should really state that the stroller ...
customer_reviews.text: Although the advertisement shows the stroller, it does NOT come with the stroller portion. The seat works great though, but should really state that the stroller is NOT included.
customer_reviews.author: Yablonsky

customer_reviews.title: Its light weight but I like my chicco fit better.
customer_reviews.text: I like the material, and that it's light weight but I like my Chico fit 30 better. This seat is smaller which means my son will grow out of it sooner and i have a hard time unlatching the seat from the base so I never take it out of the car. I also have a hard time adjusting the straps.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Maxi-Cosi Mico Nxt Infant Car Seat, Total Black
product_meta.description: The maxi cosi mico nxt infant car seat is the next generation of the mico infant seat that parents around the world already know and love. As the lightest infant car seat in its class and featuring an ergonomic handle, the mico nxt is easy to carry wherever you go.
feature_bullets: Lightest premium infant car seat available
For children 5 22 pounds and up to 29'' in height
Side impact protection and 5 point harness with up front harness adjustment
Includes stay in car adjustable base, integrated sun canopy and cozi dozi infant head support
Adapters to use mico nxt as travel system included with compatible maxi cosi and quinny strollers; adapters for many other premium strollers available from the stroller manufacturer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars43 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
